title: 820-00165-A Chimes and external display but no internal display (screen not detected?)
message:
Hi everybody,

i received a MacBookAir from 2016 (820-00165-A) with a liquid da, U5800mage. I replaced components around U8300, many components around U6101 such as U3210, U7701 (Baclkight IC) and the LCD-Connector (there were some burnmarks on pins 2-4).
I also replaced the cable of the display.
So far so good - device is booting with chimes and i got external display (unforunately i lose signal after few minutes) but i don't get internal display. 
I got the initial 3.3V on  PP5VR3V3_SW_LCD  in the first few seconds after booting but they don't stay.

So my question is: Where is my fault? Could it be a badly reballed Backlight IC? Or is it a bad LCD connector (I unsoldered one of a donor board and reused it)?
Is there any way to check why the screen is not detected? 
It's not the screen - i already tested it with a kown working assembly.

Thank you and best regards
Dudidpupan

title: 820-00165-A Chimes and external display but no internal display (screen not detected?)
message:
"I got the initial 3.3V on  PP5VR3V3_SW_LCD  in the first few seconds after booting"
DP_INT_HPD goes high at same time?

I hope you've checked voltage with LCD connected.

title: 820-00165-A Chimes and external display but no internal display (screen not detected?)
message:
No,  DP_INT_HPD does not go high!

Yes, LCD is connected :)

title: 820-00165-A Chimes and external display but no internal display (screen not detected?)
message: Is DP_INT_HPD the rail for checking LCD connected?

title: 820-00165-A Chimes and external display but no internal display (screen not detected?)
message:
Yes!
Be sure R8360 is good.

title: 820-00165-A Chimes and external display but no internal display (screen not detected?)
message: R8350 is good. I think I messed up the LCD connector when unsoldering it from the old board. Tried it with a loose lcd cable and diode mode on the multimeter bit didnt get any connection. So I will wait for my new LCD connectors and change it again :)

title: 820-00165-A Chimes and external display but no internal display (screen not detected?)
message: It works with the new LCD connector soldered on. Thank you again! :)
